metadata.title: CVE-2017-8844 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The read_1g function in stream.c in liblrzip.so in lrzip 0.631 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflowand application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.631-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
